column1: SO680 SOUTH BERMONDSEY JUNCTION TO HORSHAM

column4: Pathing or performanceallowances must not be addedbetween South Bermondsey andSouth Bermondsey Junction ineither direction due to the lack ofintermediate signals.
A 3 minute stopping headwaymay be applied if following adown train travelling towardsMitcham Junction or an up traintravelling towards Peckham Rye

column1: Streatham South Junction –Sutton (exclusive of Sutton)

column4: A 21⁄2 minute stopping headwaymay be applied at Epsom iffollowing a down train into eitherthe Up or Down Siding.* Changes in this section to beconsulted in tandem with theSW180 on the Wessex route
* Refer to Section 5.3 forrestrictions following movementsto/from Horsham Field Sidings
* Refer to Section 5.3 forrestrictions following movementsto/from Horsham Field Sidings

column1: SO680A HERNE HILL TO TULSE HILL
